Rulings.Base:
1. Returning 1 face-up monster to the hand is a Quick Effect. It cannot be used during the Damage Step. Removing 2 'Six Samurai' monsters in your GY from play is a cost.
2. It targets 1 face-up monster.
3. It can target itself.
4. It can target a Token, Fusion Monster, or Synchro Monster as well.
5. If Enishi is no longer face-up on your side of the field when the effect to return a monster is resolved, the monster is still returned to its owner's hand.
6. If you don't have any other 'Six Samurai' monsters face-up on your side of the field when the effect to return a monster is resolved, the monster is not returned to its owner's hand.
